title: GIVING THANKS '14: A Look Back
body_text:
The secret is out and yes, ECD returns on 11/22 with its second reunion of 2014 titled
FEAST COAST DODGEBALL
. While this year's grand meal is being secretly prepared, allow The Writer to ease your anxiety with this special history section of Thanksgiving past. Be sure to click on each event number for more past dishes!
________________________________________
________________________________________
__
DODGEBALL 15 | "The Road Continues"
Future
ECDElitist
TOM ADAMS against the wildly intense KURT GASSNER, SARA DECUIR'S infamous v-shot on an unsuspecting KRISTEN DRISCOLL, an astounding 37 strong, all at the final ORP event during ECD's original run .. what didn't happen!
DODGEBALL 65 | "A Thanksgiving Tradition"
Held in the midst of the 2006-2007 "Dark Days", the first of three BASISTA-SMALLS matches led the action while delicious [free] pizza from nearby Luke's Pizzeria helped feed the hungry combatants in need of a special Thanksgiving meal.
DODGEBALL 113 | "Wall v. All 4"
The fourth installment of WALL vs. ALL was all about the native Wall "Indians" and the visiting "Pilgrims" in this bloody conflict.
DODGEBALL 166 | "Megill vs. C. Adams II"
In one of ECD's historic rematches, icons KEVIN MEGILL and CHRIS ADAMS waged hellacious war for the all marbles during this holiday massacre.
DODGEBALL 177 | "Wall Brawl"
While longtime supporters of ECD - MICHAEL EDWARDS, RYAN LETSCHE, VALERIE WINSTON, and LAUREN WINSTON - were inducted into the prestigious
ECDElite
Hall of Fame, the dueling armies WALL and ALL were at yet again.
DODGEBALL 195 | "ThanksKilling"
ECD warriors returned to the Wall Battlegrounds for the first time in four months as the most recent Thanksgiving spectacular played host to an unusual alphabetic team selection process.
________________________________________
________________________________________
__
Check back soon for the major announcement regarding this year's colossal attraction!
body_html:
The secret is out and yes, ECD returns on 11/22 with its second reunion of 2014 titled FEAST COAST DODGEBALL. While this year's grand meal is being secretly prepared, allow The Writer to ease your anxiety with this special history section of Thanksgiving past. Be sure to click on each event number for more past dishes!

__________________________________________________________________________________


DODGEBALL 15 | "The Road Continues"
Future ECDElitist TOM ADAMS against the wildly intense KURT GASSNER, SARA DECUIR'S infamous v-shot on an unsuspecting KRISTEN DRISCOLL, an astounding 37 strong, all at the final ORP event during ECD's original run .. what didn't happen!

DODGEBALL 65 | "A Thanksgiving Tradition"
Held in the midst of the 2006-2007 "Dark Days", the first of three BASISTA-SMALLS matches led the action while delicious [free] pizza from nearby Luke's Pizzeria helped feed the hungry combatants in need of a special Thanksgiving meal.

DODGEBALL 113 | "Wall v. All 4"
The fourth installment of WALL vs. ALL was all about the native Wall "Indians" and the visiting "Pilgrims" in this bloody conflict.

DODGEBALL 166 | "Megill vs. C. Adams II"
In one of ECD's historic rematches, icons KEVIN MEGILL and CHRIS ADAMS waged hellacious war for the all marbles during this holiday massacre.

DODGEBALL 177 | "Wall Brawl"
While longtime supporters of ECD - MICHAEL EDWARDS, RYAN LETSCHE, VALERIE WINSTON, and LAUREN WINSTON - were inducted into the prestigious ECDElite Hall of Fame, the dueling armies WALL and ALL were at yet again.

DODGEBALL 195 | "ThanksKilling"
ECD warriors returned to the Wall Battlegrounds for the first time in four months as the most recent Thanksgiving spectacular played host to an unusual alphabetic team selection process.

__________________________________________________________________________________


Check back soon for the major announcement regarding this year's colossal attraction!
